It's silly to assume upgrading will give you the same sort of efficiency as creating the item to begin with. Making a minimum-effort base item and then funneling all future currency into dutifully sharpening and decorating it is absurd.

We're not in a rush. It's not like there's going to be a super-secret prize for making the world's second Celestial Artifact.
